means: 使复杂化( complicate的过去式)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"复杂的"之意。
means: complex ： 侧重内在关系的复杂，需通过仔细研究与了解才能掌握和运用。
complicated ： 与complex的含义接近，但语气更强，着重极其复杂，很难分析、分辨或解释。
sophisticated ： 侧重指事物发展到或达到高级的程度所体现出的复杂。
intricate ： 着重指错综复杂，令人迷惑理解。

sentence.Network_en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentence.Network_en: His love life was complicated, and involved intense relationships.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的爱情生活很复杂，几段感情都是轰轰烈烈。

sentence.Network_en: The situation was complicated by the spread of a serious forest fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 一场严重的森林大火的蔓延使得形势更加复杂。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语第三册词汇_百度文库 ... dedicated a. 潜心的 complicated a. 复杂的 dilapidated a. (房屋等)坍坏了的.
这麽复杂（complicated）、综合（comprehensive）、多层（complex）的问题，肯定没有一揽子解决方案；只能一个案例一个案例 …
艾薇儿多伦多演唱会_百度百科 ... 2. I Can Do Better 没你我更好 3. Complicated 超复杂（complicated） 4. My Happy Ending 快乐的结局.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... compliance 遵守，依从 complicated 结构复杂的；困难的 complication 结构复杂，麻烦.

list.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... complex 合成的；复杂的 complicate 使复杂；使陷入 composition 写作；组成.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... duplicate 二倍的，副本 complication 综合症；并发症；复杂 implicit 含蓄的.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... commute a sentence 减刑 complicity 共谋，共犯 concussive grenade 振荡手榴弹.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... complication 复杂 complice 同伙 complicity 同谋.

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲：Complicated 歌手：Avril Lavigne 专辑：《Let Go》 发行日期：2002年6月4日 语言：英语歌曲介绍 Avril Lavigne的这首《Complicated》，是首正中爱情骗子要害的简洁歌曲；沾染了弦乐色彩的“I’mWith You”反映了Avril较为温和的一面。《Complicated》并不是特别描写某一个人。基本上它是一首关于生活、伪装的人们和人际关系的歌曲。 单曲"Complicated"连续5周高居单曲榜首。 单曲"Complicated&quo

entry.tran: 复杂的;难懂的;难处理的
entry.def: If you say that something is complicated, you mean it has so many parts or aspects that it is difficult to understand or deal with.

example.ex: The situation in Lebanon is very complicated.
example.tran: 黎巴嫩的情况十分复杂。

auth_sentence.content: For individuals, things get a little more complicated.
auth_sentence.res_content: For individuals, things get a little more complicated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For individuals, things get a little more complicated.

auth_sentence.content: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems too complicated and very broad for me.

auth_sentence.content: But hosting streaming video can be complicated and expensive.
auth_sentence.res_content: But hosting streaming video can be complicated and expensive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But hosting streaming video can be complicated and expensive.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

Sentence.sentence: Already, by paying close attention to and interacting with the world and people around him, and without any school-type formal instruction, he has done a task far more difficult, complicated and abstract than anything he will be asked to do in school, or than any of his teachers has done for years.

And while he has been doing this, he has been learning other things as well, including many of the concepts that the schools think only they can teach him, and many that are more complicated than the ones they do try to teach him
The problem is more complicated than I thought.
He has tackled more complicated problems than this
The full details are complicated - the text alone runs to 385 pages– and trying to summarise it is no easy task.

sentences.en: This is the most complicated case I have ever handled.
sentences.cn: 这是我所处理过的最为复杂的案子。

jushi.english: This is the most complicated case I have ever handled.
jushi.chinese: 这是我所处理过的最为复杂的案子。

jushi.english: This puzzle is too complicated for the children.
jushi.chinese: 这个智力游戏对孩子们来说太复杂了。
